English: Interacting with me is very simple: just follow my prompts and answer the questions that I ask you in the manner that I ask you them, by using the textbox or selecting an option where applicable.

Special Commands: * /help - If you need to be reminded of these instructions at any time, just send this command! * /repeat - If you need me to repeat a question before you have had the chance to submit a complete answer, send this command, and I will ask the question again!
